column4: So, the mpd that ships with Jaunty does not have pulse support built in, I take it?
Wait, let me correct my typo, lol
Ok, evidently NOTHING has audio except for mpd
to get audio back, kill mpd
Or is an actual kill needed?
not stop as in stop audio playing, but stop as in the process ceases to exist.
Yeah, I know what you meant. ;)
haha maybe it still hasn't released the sound card
any way to force a release?
sorry, I don't know why it still hasn't even done it after killing mpd
